text: I'm Nicholas Kristof a columnist for The
New York Times I'm just back from
Central Africa one of my frequent
reporting trips abroad to look at global
poverty and global health and usually I
ask the questions will you really be
able to send the next child to school I
mean if you have difficulty paying for
